message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $20,000. I believe it offers significant value, even beyond its price.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to stay within my budget. Would you consider lowering the price to $18,000?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm confident this product offers significant value beyond $18,000. Could you meet me halfway at $19,000?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, I am still looking to stay within my budget. Would you consider $18,000 as a fair compromise?
